review: I got Salmonella poisoning in my blood (Sepsis). It seems the only means I could have contracted it, is by my Gecko. Salmonella lives in the gut of certain animals and doesn't bother them. Cipro is the only antibiotic helping me. I have not had any negative side-effects. This is my 5th antibiotic. Once my blood cultures grew enough to identify the actual strain, this is the one that is helping me. No more high fever and diarrhea is somewhat better. Salmonella Sepsis can be very lethal and also causes many biological problems.
I use it for typhoid fever in injection form for four days the fever gone away but now I feel very weak and drowsy. I feel severe pain in my body
I had typhoid fever few days back. But this drug did a lot for me. But it make's me weak and drowsy.
